objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Business/Corporate lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to work and career in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about work and career using neutral register
Students create original business themed content about work and career in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in business context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within business theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
